about.title: About
about.description: Inspire Daily is an application that helps you create authentic content for your social media.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that the best content comes from authentic and personal experiences. Our mission is to help you share these moments with your audience in an engaging and natural way.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We encourage authentic and personal sharing.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We stimulate your creativity with inspiring questions.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build a community of creators who help each other.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We're here to help. Don't hesitate to contact us with any questions.

support.title: Support
support.description: Need help? Check our resources or contact us.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Quickly find answers to your questions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Our team is here to help.

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Guides and tutorials to help you get started.
